about.title: About
about.introduce: I am a front-end developer with one year of hands-on experience, proficient in modern web development using Vue 3. I am currently learning React to broaden my front-end skill set and move toward a more full-stack capability. I have participated in projects such as real-time chat systems, interactive 3D web pages, and multilingual applications.

content.introduce:
**Payment Software Maintenance (Vue2)**: Responsible for maintaining the already-launched payment software, ensuring the system runs stably, and performing necessary feature optimizations and performance improvements.
**Real-time Chat Software Development (Vue3)**: Developing a real-time chat application based on Vue3, integrating WebSocket technology to implement real-time communication features, ensuring efficient user interaction.
**Dynamic 3D Page Design**: Using Three.js to design dynamic and interactive 3D pages to enhance user experience.
**Multilingual Support (i18n)**:  Implementing multilingual translation of the application using i18n technology to meet the needs of global users.

I have deeply studied multiple modern front-end technologies through self-learning, including TypeScript, Vue 3, Nuxt 3, and other frameworks. I also combined tools like Sass and Tailwind CSS to create responsive and highly maintainable websites. During the learning process, I practiced backend technologies through Firebase, which enhanced my full-stack development capabilities.

content.company: Front-End Web Design and Programming Technical Practice Course
content.introduce: Through the training in the in-service program, I gained a deep understanding of the basics of front-end development, from HTML, CSS to JavaScript and jQuery. I also learned how to use Bootstrap for rapid prototyping.

content.name: Personal Blog
content.explain: Created 3D models using Blender and Three.js, and implemented interactive animations through Raycaster.Supports switching between Chinese and English using i18n.

content.name: Birthday Candle Blowing
content.introduce: Built 3D models using Three.js and simulated blowing out candles by detecting sound volume.
content.explain: Created 3D models using Blender and Three.js. The candle flame flickers and extinguishes based on the detected sound volume. URL parameters are used to specify the recipient and the gift.

content.name: Weather Helper
content.introduce: A weather query website built with Nuxt3, integrated with the Central Weather Bureau API.
content.explain: Used SVG to create a Taiwan map and integrated the Central Weather Bureau API to fetch weather data for each county and city.

content.name: E-commerce Fashion Website
content.introduce: An e-commerce website built with Vue3 and TypeScript, integrated with Firebase for the member system.
content.explain: Used Firebase Authentication for the member system, Firestore Database and Storage to store product data and order records.

content.name: Hotel Booking Website
content.introduce: A hotel booking website built with Vue3, integrated with Firebase for the member system.
content.explain: Used Firebase Authentication for the member system, Firestore Database and Storage to store order records.
